text: "Don't Need the Sun to Shine (To Make Me Smile)" is a 2001 song by Gabrielle. It was taken from her greatest hits album Dreams Can Come True, Greatest Hits Vol. 1. It went to number 4 in Portugal, number 7 in Scotland, number 9 in the United Kingdom, number 11 in Denmark, number 13 in New Zealand. It charted poorly in Australia where it only made #98. ==Track listings== ==References== Category:2001 songs Category:Gabrielle songs
title: Don't Need the Sun to Shine (To Make Me Smile)
